name: Super Monkie Bounce Fatal
description:
Reject Humanity, Return to Monke

In Super Monkie Bounce Fatal,
your goal is to make your car reach the end of the track to snatch the win.

The catch ? You're not actually driving the car !

* Battle against your opponent in fierce 1vs1 matches

* Make the Banana Ball bounce on the walls to generate electricity and power-up your car batteries !

* Perform combos and stop your adversary from touching the ball to gain even more speed !

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Big thanks to the whole Team :

Devy Arthur

Gouin Emilie
